participant_1.background:
My passion for helping couples create the perfect wedding day will not let me give up hope even in the most difficult of situations.
i am saving up to buy a new camera.
My husband and I love working with our hands and building things together.
i enjoy deep sea diving.
i got hired last week at mcdonald.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy fishing, but I lost my favorite fishing pole in a boating accident.
my mother was a school music teacher.
my hobby is sewing.
i live in a rural community.
I am a hard worker and I am proud of my accomplishments.

content.text: Hello! I love working with my hands and building things too! What have you been working on lately?
Hi there! I have been sewing some clothes for my kids. I also love to crochet.
That is awesome! What kind of clothes are you sewing?
I usually just make simple dresses and skirts. I am trying to learn how to make pants.
Pants can be really tricky! But I know you can do it!
Thanks! I hope so! I have been working on a pair for my son for a while now.
Well I am sure he will love them!
Me too! I am trying to teach him how to sew too.
That is awesome! I wish my mom had taught me how to sew.
It is a great skill to have! I am glad I learned from my mom.
Me too! Thanks for chatting with me! I need to get back to work.
No problem! It was nice talking to you!
